quests.description: It's where the Nitro is!

quests.description: A wrecking ball on wheels! HAHAHAHA!

quests.description: Faster, Faster, FASTER!

quests.description: You really expect me to pick a favorite? THEY'RE ALL MY FAVORITE!

quests.description: Finders keepers, which means it's MINE now.

quests.description: Ah, so refreshing! The spines are a little rough going down, though.

quests.description: Fly! FLY!!!

quests.name: Mod a vehicle with a Machine Gun Turret or Grenade Launcher Turret
quests.description: Here's a brite idea: install some guns on your ride!! - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Mod a vehicle with a Machine Gun Turret or Grenade Launcher Turret

quests.name: Repair vehicle damage with a Service Station
quests.description: Gotta know how to repair your ride. Unless you just leave 'em wrecked... - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Repair vehicle damage with a Service Station

quests.name: Pass through a Flaming Boost Hoop
quests.description: Watch your head! And your wheels. - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Pass through a Flaming Boost Hoop

quests.name: Collect a Medallion
quests.description: Show everyone you're the top of the scrap heap! - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Collect a Medallion

quests.name: Damage opponents while infused with Nitro
quests.description: This Nitro stuff is pretty fun, huh?? - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Damage opponents while infused with Nitro

quests.name: With Nitro Fists perform an Uppercut then land with an Air Punch
quests.description: I scream a little every time. It's so FUN! - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: With Nitro Fists perform an Uppercut then land with an Air Punch

quests.name: Step into an Oasis Pool and the Nitrodrome
quests.description: Get to know the wasteland. It's a pretty special place. - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Step into an Oasis Pool and the Nitrodrome

quests.name: Accept a Wastelander Challenge
quests.description: You up for a REAL challenge? - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Accept a Wastelander Challenge

quests.name: Open Collections and view Accolades
quests.description: Wastelanders LOVE our bragging rights. - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Open Collections and view Accolades

quests.name: Mod vehicles in different matches
quests.description: A true wastelander knows how to mod their ride. - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Mod vehicles in different matches

quests.name: Apply Nitro in different matches
quests.description: Sometimes while I'm shooting 'em, I'll also yell BOOOOO! - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Apply Nitro in different matches

quests.name: Damage Marauder's Vehicles
quests.description: Nitro's kind of the heart of the wasteland. Or the adrenaline in its blood. - Brite Raider
quests.shortDescription: Damage Marauder's Vehicles

quests.name: Talk to Hope and Jones
quests.description: Welcome to the wasteland. We've got a new mission for you. - Hope and Jones
quests.shortDescription: Talk to Hope and Jones

quests.name: Damage opponents with a vehicle while boosting
quests.description: We're going to have to take down Megalo Don. Let's get you in fighting shape. - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Damage opponents with a vehicle while boosting

quests.name: Destroy objects or structures while infused with Nitro
quests.description: How powerful is this Nitro stuff, anyway? - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Destroy objects or structures while infused with Nitro

quests.name: Install Vehicle Mods
quests.description: If we want to keep up with Megalo Don, we'll need vehicles that can keep pace with his. - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Install Vehicle Mods

quests.name: Search containers at Wasteland Landmarks
quests.description: If the loot's in your inventory, it's not in Megalo Don's. And I consider that a win. - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Search containers at Wasteland Landmarks

quests.name: Collect surveillance devices at different Wasteland locations
quests.description: I'm picking up some weird chatter... - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Collect surveillance devices at different Wasteland locations

quests.name: Get intel from Brite Raider and Rust
quests.description: I'm hearing some interesting wasteland chatter... - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Get intel from Brite Raider and Rust

quests.name: Collect a security card from guards at Redline Rig
quests.description: A keycard's the fastest way past Redline Rig's security system. - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Collect a security card from guards at Redline Rig

quests.name: Upload data to Hope from Terminals at Redline Rig
quests.description: Log into any Terminal and upload everything you find to Hope's secure uplink. - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Upload data to Hope from Terminals at Redline Rig

quests.name: Destroy structures at Megalo Depot or Brutal Beachhead
quests.description: While Hope digs through the rest of those files... Why don't we sabotage Megalo Don? - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Destroy structures at Megalo Depot or Brutal Beachhead

quests.name: Damage opponents at Megalo Depot or Brutal Beachhead
quests.description: A little combat chaos should disrupt Megalo Don's plans nicely. - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Damage opponents at Megalo Depot or Brutal Beachhead

quests.name: Steal the Pandora Gem at Brutal Beachhead
quests.description: If those Gems are from Pandora's Box... we should collect them before they fall into the wrong hands. - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Steal the Pandora Gem at Brutal Beachhead

quests.name: Deliver the Pandora Gem to Hope
quests.description: Bring Pandora Gem to me. I'll make sure it stays out of the wrong hands. - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Deliver the Pandora Gem to Hope

quests.name: Enter the Nitrodrome
quests.description: It's time to meet Ringmaster Scarr. - Hope
quests.shortDescription: Enter the Nitrodrome

quests.name: Talk to Peabody at Pea Bois HQ
quests.description: Peabody's got the next Gemstone. Um... Whoever that is. - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Talk to Peabody at Pea Bois HQ

quests.name: Coordinate the plan with Peabody at Pea Bois HQ
quests.description: Peabody might know something about Megalo Don's security. - Jones
quests.shortDescription: Coordinate the plan with Peabody at Pea Bois HQ
